title: Advertising
questions: - What effects do advertising have on children?
- Which method of advertising do you think is most popular?
- How do advertisements capture people's attention?
- What do you think of advertisements in your country?
- How has the rise of digital platforms and social media transformed advertising strategies?

title: Animals
questions: - What roles do animals typically play in your country?
- How do human activities impact the lives of wild animals?
- Is it common to own pets in your country?
- What are some pros and cons associated with having a pet?
- Should animals be kept in zoos?

title: Art
questions: - Why do people find enjoyment in art?
- What are some traditional forms of art in your country?
- How important is art as a subject in children's education?
- How frequently do you visit art galleries?
- Why do certain works of art sell for high amounts, whereas others do not?

title: Books
questions: - Do you prefer to read physical books, or e-books?
- Are you good at story-telling?
- What kinds of books do children like to read in your country?
- Do you think children can learn a lot from reading books?
- Are you more interested in reading fiction or non-fiction?

title: Business
questions: - Are there any entrepreneurs or business leaders you admire?
- How important is innovation in the success of a business?
- Why do some people want to start their own business?
- What advice would you give to someone starting their own business?
- Do you think customer service is an important part of a company's success?

title: Childhood
questions: - Do you think it is important for a child to have many friends?
- What kinds of dreams did you have as a child?
- Can you recall any favorite games or activities from your childhood?
- How did you celebrate birthdays or special occasions during your childhood?
- Who were your childhood heroes or role models?

title: Culture
questions: - Do you think it is important to learn about other cultures?
- Are there many types of traditional food in your country?
- Do you think modern lifestyles impact the preservation of traditional practices?
- Do you feel a sense of responsibility to pass on your cultural traditions to younger generations?
- Is your country influenced by cultures of foreign countries?

title: Decisions
questions: - What difficult decisions have you had to make in your life?
- Do you like to get advice from other people when faced with a hard decision?
- Do you like to make quick decisions?
- Why do people change their minds after making a decision?
- Should children be allowed to make their own decisions?

title: Education
questions: - Do many people in your country study abroad?
- How can technology help teachers and students in the classroom?
- How important are parents in their child's education?
- What are the advantages and disadvantages of online education?
- Does the size of the class have an impact on the quality of education?

title: Environment
questions: - How important is it to recycle?
- What kinds of environmental problems is your country facing?
- Should businesses play a role in protecting the environment?
- Do you think climate change will influence our lives in the future?
- Do you think schools should teach about protecting the environment?

title: Family
questions: - How are families now different from families in the past?
- How important is the extended family in your country?
- How do family members care for the elder generations in your country?
- Do children live in their family homes for many years?
- Do you think the size of the family will change in the future in your country?

title: Food
questions: - Do people in your country like to eat at restaurants?
- Do you think it is important to have a diet?
- How popular is fast food in your country?
- How has technology, such as food delivery apps and social media, impacted the way you experience food?
- How do you think the way we eat will change in the future?

title: Health
questions: - Do you think it is important to maintin a healthy lifestyle?
- In what ways do people do exercise in your country?
-  How do you think elderly people should exercise?
- What unhealthy habits do you know about?
- Is it important to have a work/study-life balance in order to maintain good health?

title: Internet
questions: - Do you think our lives have been improved by the internet?
- Do you think many problems are created by the internet?
- How do you think the internet will change in the future?
- How can the internet be made safe for children to use?
- How can the internet be used effectively in schools?

title: Language
questions: - Why do you think people have difficulties learning languages?
- Do you think foreign langauges should be learnt from an early age?
- Does language change our perceptions of the world?
- How has technology made language learning easier?
- What challenges do people face when communicating in a language that is not their own?

title: Leadership
questions: - What abilities are needed for an effective leader?
- What can a leader do to stay popular?
- What kinds of challenges do leaders face?
- How do leaders maintain trust among their people?
- How important is leadership in the workplace?

title: Leisure
questions: - What are some popular leisure activities in your country?
- In what ways has technology influenced the way people engage in leisure activities?
- How important are leisure activities in helping to reduce stress?
- How do people enjoy free time by themselves?
- What are the benefits of trying new hobbies?

title: Life Experience
questions: - What role do relationships with family and friends play in shaping our life experience?
- What can we learn about life experience from other people?
- Do you think it is important to make mistakes in life?
- Can we gain life experience from books and movies?
- Is it important to think a lot about our past memories?

title: Money
questions: - How important is it to save money for the future?
- Do you think having more money leads to more happiness?
- In what ways do people tend to waste money?
- How does advertising influence the way we spend money?
- Do you think it important to give money to charity?

title: Movies
questions: - Is it more common to watch movies in the cinema or at home in your country?
- How have streaming services changed the way people experience movies?
- Do you consider movies to be a form of art or a form of entertainment?
- Do you think it important for a movie to have good music?
- Do you think technology has made movies better? In what ways?

title: Music
questions: - Do you think it is important for children to learn a musical instrument?
- What kind of music do old people listen to in your country?
- Is music important in traditional events or holidays in your country?
- Do you think music can help us to acquire new languages?
- What kinds of effects does music have on our emotions?

title: Nature
questions: - What kinds of outdoor activities are popular in your country?
- Should we be doing more to protect the natural environment?
- Do you think it will be harder to protect the environment in the future?
- Can nature influence creativity in a person?
- How popular is visiting national parks in your country?

title: News
questions: - How do people stay informed about current events in your country?
- How has social media changed the way we consume news?
- Is it important to stay up to date on international news in your country?
- Why do you think people like to recieve good news?
- In what ways will people get news in the future?

title: Photography
questions: - Do you think anybody can be a photographer?
- In what ways have smartphones influenced how people take photos?
- Is important to get permission from someone before sharing their photo online?
- What impact do selfies have in modern society?
- How important are family photos in your country?

title: Shopping
questions: - Have shopping habits changed in recent years in your country?
- Do you think advertising has an influence on the way people shop?
- What do you imagine the future of online shopping to look like?
- How does the availability of various payment methods, such as credit cards and digital wallets, influence people's shopping habits?
- Is it necessary to read customer reviews when shopping online?

title: Sports
questions: - Are there many benefits of playing a sport?
- Do you think people should play sports from an early age?
- How do big sporting events such as the Olympics bring people together?
- Is it a good idea for a country to host an international sporting event?
- Is it important for athletes to be good role models?

title: Technology
questions: - Do you think it is important to stay up to date with new technology?
- What is the impact of modern technology on our daily lives?
- Do you think people tend to spend too much money on technology these days?
- How can old people benefit from using technology?
- As technology continues to advance, should we be more concerned about data privacy and security?

title: Television
questions: - Why do you think people like watching television?
- Do you think children can be educated by television?
- How different is TV now compared to 10 years ago?
- Are there big differences between the shows young and old people watch?
- How do you think television will change in the future?

title: Time Management
questions: - How do you manage your time in your daily life?
- Do you think it is important to balance time between work/study and life?
- In what ways do you think people tend to waste time?
- How important is it to take breaks in your daily schedule?
-In your country What do people think of being late?

title: Transportation
questions: - What are the most commonly used types of transportation in your country?
- Should we use public transportation more, and use cars less?
- What impact does transportation have on the environment?
- Could transportation be improved in your country?
- What do you think the future of transportation will look like?

title: Travel
questions: - Which places do people like to visit in your country?
- Do you think travel is safer now than it was in the past?
- How important is planning ahead of a trip?
- What can be learned from travelling to foreign countries?
- Why do you think some people prefer travelling alone?

title: Weather
questions: - Does your country experience all seasons?
- Does the weather have an influence on our mood?
- In your country are there any extreme weather events?
- What types of outdoor activities can people do in cold weather?
- How can we get up to date information about the weather?

title: Work
questions: - In what ways does work create stress?
- Is it more important to be happy at work, or have a high salary?
- Why do you think people like to become freelancers/work for themselves?
- Where can people work more productively, in the office or at home?
- When do you think is the best age to retire?
